data.title: Accelerating ML at Twitter
data.description: Theodore Summe offers a glimpse into how Twitter employs machine learning throughout its product.

data.title: The latest from TensorFlow
data.description: Megan Kacholia explains how Google’s latest innovations provide an ecosystem of tools for developers, enterprises, and researchers who want to build scalable ML-powered applications.

data.title: TensorFlow World 2019 opening keynote
data.description: Jeff Dean explains why Google open-sourced TensorFlow and discusses its progress.

data.title: TensorFlow community announcements
data.description: Kemal El Moujahid reveals new developments for the TensorFlow community.

data.title: Highlights from O'Reilly AI London 2019
data.description: Experts explore AI's most promising developments, emerging technologies, and profitable use cases.

data.title: When to trust AI
data.description: Marta Kwiatkowska provides an overview of techniques being developed to help improve the robustness, safety, and trust in AI systems.

data.title: When flying is cheaper than standing still
data.description: Raffaello D’Andrea presents his vision of how autonomous indoor drones will drive the next wave of robotics development.

data.title: Machine learning challenges at LinkedIn: Spark, TensorFlow, and beyond
data.description: Zhe Zhang provides an architectural overview of LinkedIn’s machine learning pipelines.

data.title: Accelerate with purpose
data.description: Walter Riviera discusses three key shifts in the AI landscape.

data.title: The quest for high-quality data
data.description: Ihab Ilyas describes the HoloClean framework, a prediction engine for structured data with direct applications in detecting and repairing data errors.

data.title: Real-time AI for entity resolution
data.description: Jeff Jonas details how you can use a purpose-built real-time AI to gain new insights and make better decisions faster.

data.title: The power of knowledge at scale
data.description: Alexis Crowell Helzer outlines a practical approach to implementing machine learning.

data.title: Building and deploying AI systems at scale
data.description: Ben Lorica and Roger Chen review how companies are building AI applications today.

data.title: Large-scale machine learning at Facebook: Implications of platform design on developer productivity
data.description: Kim Hazelwood and Mohamed Fawzy look at how applied ML has changed the platforms and infrastructure at Facebook.

data.title: Machine learning for operational analytics and business intelligence
data.description: The O’Reilly Data Show Podcast: Peter Bailis on data management, ML benchmarks, and building next-gen tools for analysts.

data.title: TinyML: The opportunities of low-power ML apps
data.description: In this edition of the Radar column, we look at what’s possible when ML apps can work with minimal or inconsistent power supplies.

data.title: Highlights from Strata NY '19
data.description: Experts explore new trends, tools, and techniques in data and machine learning.

data.title: Delivering the enterprise data cloud
data.description: Arun Murthy introduces the open source Cloudera Data Platform (CDP).

data.title: Data Science Pioneers: Conquering the next frontier, a documentary investigating the future of data science
data.description: Jed Dougherty presents the trailer of the upcoming Data Science Pioneers documentary.

data.title: Postrevolutionary big data: Promoting the general welfare
data.description: Barbara Eckman shares lessons learned from early big data mistakes and the progress her team at Comcast is making toward a big data vision.

data.title: Say what? The ethical challenges of designing for humanlike interaction
data.description: Jonathan Foster explains why language reveals ethical challenges we couldn’t encounter with GUI-powered experiences.

data.title: RL in real life: Bringing reinforcement learning to the enterprise
data.description: Edward Jezierski discusses the ways reinforcement learning is used across Microsoft.

data.title: Staying safe in the AI era
data.description: Cassie Kozyrkov offers actionable advice for taking advantage of machine learning, navigating the AI era, and staying safe as you innovate.

data.title: Strata Data Awards winners 2019
data.description: The Strata Data Awards recognize the most innovative startups, leaders, and data science projects from Strata sponsors and exhibitors.

data.title: Data sonification: Making music from the yield curve
data.description: Alan Smith says combining visualization and sonification could take the presentation of data into the expanding universe of screenless devices and products.

data.title: Unlocking the value of your data
data.description: Daniel Hernandez looks at how a unified, prescriptive information architecture can help organizations unlock the value of their data.

data.title: Machine learning and analytics for time series data
data.description: The O’Reilly Data Show Podcast: Arun Kejariwal and Ira Cohen on building large-scale, real-time solutions for anomaly detection and forecasting.

data.title: The future of Google Cloud data processing
data.description: James Malone introduces new Google Cloud capabilities that help data professionals build scalable and flexible applications faster.

data.title: Interactive sports analytics
data.description: Patrick Lucey explains methods to find play similarity using multi-agent trajectory data, as well as predicting fine-grain plays.

data.title: AI isn’t magic. It’s computer science.
data.description: Rob Thomas and Tim O’Reilly discuss the hard work and mass experimentation that will lead to AI breakthroughs.
